msg: Allow GNUiconv to be compiled on Solaris (XERCESC-1856)

author: lhazlewood
msg: removed session timeout that was used in local testing only

author: lhazlewood
msg: Removed ReplacedSessionException and its uses - it turns out recovery logic was already available in the SecurityManager implementations - the SessionManager should not auto-recreate sessions and instead should be left to the decision of the SecurityManager based on application needs.  The default SecurityManager behavior works acceptably well in both web and non web applications.

author: davsclaus
msg: Added facade for copy on write experiment
